original_title: Stacey Dooley Investigates Shot By My Neighbour
overview: Every year dozens of people in Northern Ireland are shot in the legs or assaulted by vigilante armed groups from their own neighbourhoods. These paramilitary-style attacks are known as `kneecappings', and can leave the victims, usually young men, with lifelong physical and mental injuries.
title: Stacey Dooley Investigates Shot By My Neighbour
